\item \ref{constraint:keep_layer_deadlines_sum_under_workflow_deadline} ensures that workflow finishes in given deadline
\item \ref{constraint:bind_instance_active_with_instance_hours_1} and \ref{constraint:bind_instance_active_with_instance_hours_2} ensure that $\glssymbol{InstanceHours}$ may be allocated only iif $\glssymbol{InstanceActive}$ is $1$
\item \ref{constraint:bind_instance_active_with_instance_tasks_1} and \ref{constraint:bind_instance_active_with_instance_tasks_2} ensure that $\glssymbol{InstanceTasks}$ may be allocated only iif $\glssymbol{InstanceActive}$ is $1$
\item \ref{constraint:keep_layer_deadline} enforces level deadline on instances runtime
\item \ref{constraint:keep_layer_deadline_2} enforces level finishes work in $\glssymbol{LayerTime}$
\item \ref{constraint:is_there_enough_processing_power_to_do_the_tasks} adjust $\glssymbol{InstanceHours}$ respectively to $\glssymbol{InstanceTasks}$
\item \ref{constraint:enough_power} ensures that all tasks are processed
\item \ref{constraint:discard_symmetric_solutions_1} to \ref{constraint:discard_symmetric_solutions_3} reject symmetric solutions
\item \ref{constraint:force_provider_instance_limit} enforces providers' instance limits
